actions.committee: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

official_title: Resolution to amend rule XLIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives respecting the solicitation or acceptance of gifts by Members of the House.

summary.text: Amends rule XLIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit any Member from soliciting or accepting a gift of money for personal use.

titles.title: Resolution to amend rule XLIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives respecting the solicitation or acceptance of gifts by Members of the House.
